item.title: I added this under another command and it won't work
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Try this:

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragonz”))
{
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(4585,1);
addItem(5698,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(5680,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(1837,1);
sendMessage(“your a noob…”);
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“modt”))
{
addItem(1048,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(6570,1);
addItem(6585,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(4224,1);
addItem(1837,1);
sendMessage(“Looking good…”);
}[/code]

item.title: I added this under another command and it won't work
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Put the } closer to the else.

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragonz”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(4585,1);
addItem(5698,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(5680,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(1837,1);
sendMessage(“your a noob…”);
}

And have both commands just if.
